title: [Temperature check] - Communications & Marketing Pilot League
body:
### Summary
As proposed by [@unicorn]( https://gov.idle.finance/u/unicorn/summary) [in this post](https://idlefinance.medium.com/about-idle-leagues-73fa538f18e5), this subDAO will focus on Communication & Marketing (‘C&M’) with the goals of helping to bolster community engagement and other content marketing initiatives for the Idle protocol.
This poll aims to officialize and approve the C&M subDAO structure, all its parameters, and the total budget planned for this mandate.
### Details
 The C&M Pilot League has been a part of the long-term vision for SubDAO leagues structure, for this Pilot the community engagement campaigns should be the first step in that direction.
The new C&M Pilot league will align with other existing Leagues current mandate timelines, and end on **4th August 2021**.
The C&M Pilot League will have an **Operating budget of 5,000 $IDLE** to help achieve the goals of this mandate. As this is a low amount these funds come from the Treasury League budget.
The C&M League will be composed by the following team members:

 **2 Project Managers**: 
**mangaa18** – [Application post]( https://gov.idle.finance/t/communications-marketing-pilot-league/514/6)
**mikojava** – [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/communications-marketing-pilot-league/514/5)

**1 Supervisor**: 
**Idle Labs Team @Teo+@Davide**  – [Application post]( https://gov.idle.finance/t/communications-marketing-pilot-league/514/8)
### Vote Options
Please cast your vote on one of the following options:

            1. FOR: Proceed with this proposal

            2. AGAINST: Do not proceed with this proposal
author: 0xf27d7e8E96e891D77F42E1d88dA872A1cFaFe91a
